name: Aluminium Ore
description: Aluminium Ore is a mid-game Mineral Resource . Prospectors can first utilize aluminium once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3 , when it can be crafted into upgraded Weapons like the Recurve Bow and Aluminium Arrow . It is widely used in constructs (for example, Aluminium Beam and Aluminium Door ), and in the late-game it is a vital component of Items like Composite Chest Armor .
